(Pressed for time, so I'm not going to make a nice post)

Nemesis Enforcer:


Nemesis Enforcer walks into a large, badly damaged room and drops a 
pile of weapons and supplies, the sixth and final time he's done so.  
He raises his wrist near his metallic lips and activates his comm. 
unit.  "Megatron, it's Nemesis Enforcer.  I've gathered all those 
fuggin' supplies you wanted.  What next, o' mighty leader?"
